title: fix: update form data on radio button change in contact relationship form (#7226)

body:
Close #7226 
Close #7227 
When a user clicks "I know the name" then "I don't know the name" when creating a contact's relationship, the form data is not updated; Any entered names are retained, otherwise the form won't submit and will ask for the name(s) to be entered. I have added a function to clear the form fields that are used when "I know the name" option is selected. This function is called when a user clicks the "I don't know the name" radio button. This solves the above issues.

issue.title: Relationship uses values from "I know the name" even if "I don't know the name" is selected
issue.body:
### ⚠️ This issue respects the following points: ⚠️

- [X] This is a **bug**, not a question or a configuration/webserver/proxy issue.
- [X] This issue is **not** already reported on [Github](https://github.com/monicahq/monica/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Abug) _(I've searched it)_.
- [X] I agree to follow Monica's [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/monicahq/monica/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).

### Bug description

Relationship uses values from "I know the name" even if "I don't know the name" is selected

### Steps to reproduce

1. Go to a contact > Social > Add a relationship 
2. Select any relationship type
3. Select "I know the name", a text box will appear
4. Enter a name in the text box
5. Select "I don't know the name"
  ![image](https://github.com/monicahq/monica/assets/6508687/6f06749a-3e5c-4df3-9dc5-2cc792066f57)
6. Click "Add"
7. Go to the contact > Social
8. The relationship has the name you entered above, even though you selected "I don't know the name"
  ![image](https://github.com/monicahq/monica/assets/6508687/e1e862e2-e6cb-4b05-aaf1-0af4c030848b)


### Expected behavior

For the relationship name to be shown to be unknown

### Environment

beta.monicahq.com (v5 a.k.a chandler version or main branch)

### Version of Monica

Version v5.0.0-beta.3 — commit 2f5225b.

### Installation method

None

### Web server

None

### Database engine version

None
